value.title: AWS to support Korean startups with Generative AI Accelerator
value.excerpt: Amazon Web Services (AWS) will help Korean AI startups grow with its Generative AI Accelerator, a program that combines powerful AI tools with business, technical mentors and experts, the global-leading cloud computing service provider said Tuesday.

value.title: Amazon Web Services (AWS) revenue topped $22 billion Q2 2023
value.excerpt: Amazon (AMZN) reported its Q2 2023 earnings results on Thursday evening, within which the company revealed that its Amazon Web Services (AWS) revenue topped $22 billion despite the AWS segment making less profit than the prior year.

value.title: AWS expands Bedrock with new AI models and complex task automation
value.excerpt: Amazon Web Services Inc. announced today during AWS Summit New York that it’s expanding its fully managed artificial intelligence foundational model service Bedrock to include a variety of new models from Cohere, Anthropic and Stability AI, as well as the capacity for developers to deploy their own automated agents to execute complex tasks.

value.title: AWS launches new healthcare-focused services, powered by generative AI
value.excerpt: Amazon says that the AI capabilities in HealthScribe are powered by Bedrock, its platform that provides a way to build generative AI-powered apps via pretrained models from startups as well as Amazon itself. This might be cause for alarm, given generative AI’s tendency to exhibit biases, confidently invent facts and generally go off the rails.
